resetAndStart().Description: Reset counters and ensure counts are running. Counts may have already been running.
resetAndStart().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 23

globalTotal().Description: Return the total number of instructions executed globally (i.e. in all threads).
globalTotal().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 23

globalMethodInvocations().Description: Return the total number of method-invocation instructions executed globally.
globalMethodInvocations().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 23

collect().Description: Collect instruction counts. May or may not stop the counting process.
collect().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 23

ClassDesc: Instruction counting is no longer supported. API for gathering and querying instruction counts. Example usage:
